task.title: Managing device settings
task.shortdesc: You can manage some Sametime settings from the device settings.

step.cmd: Open the Settings screen on your device.
Tap the arrow next to Sametime to open settings that the Sametime app uses.
step.info:
In the Sametime Settings section, you can define the following settings:
Return Key Sends Message When this setting is on, tapping the return key sends a chat message. When it is off, tapping the return key inserts a return character so that you can write multiple-line messages. This setting is helpful when you use an external keyboard with an iPad.
Debug Logging Enables additional logging. To avoid performance issues, turn this setting on only when troubleshooting a problem with HCL support.
